item.title: Learning LINQ
item.description: Learning LINQ is best done by reading the fantastic LINQ in Action book that’s currently in your hands. It’s simply amazing, and has such wonderful code samples, don’t you agree?

item.title: LINQ to XML Axis methods make XML LINQable
item.description: Without the LINQ to XML Axis methods LINQ to XML would simply be one of the many XML APIs available in .Net land. With axis methods, we get an extremely powerful XML API, as well as a killer query story that puts XPath, XSLT, and friends to shame.
